product_name: Uco Beeswax Tealight Candles - Package of 3
long_description: The Uco Beeswax Tealight Candles provide the pleasant aroma of honey and produce less smoke than standard wax candles. Designed specifically for the Uco Mini and Micro candle lanterns (sold separately). Each candle provides about 3 - 4 hrs. of burn time. Package includes 3 Uco Beeswax Tealight Candles.
short_description: The Uco Beeswax Tealight Candles provide the pleasant aroma of honey and produce less smoke than standard wax candles.
